charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. § 1344 and 2     Bank Fraud and aiding and abetting(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 24 months, to be served concurrently with Count 43 of the Indictment and Count 1 of the Information. Supervised release: 2 years, to be served concurrently with all other Counts. Special assessment: $100. Total restitution: $43,978.54.

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. § 922(g)(5)(A)  Possession of a Firearm by a Prohibited Person  - Illegal Alien(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 24 months, to be served concurrently with Counts 1 and 43 of the Indictment. Supervised release: 2 years, to be served concurrently with all other Counts. Special assessment: $100. Total restitution: $43,978.54.

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. § 1028A  Aggravated    Identity Theft(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 24 months, to be served consecutively to all other Counts. Supervised release: 1 year, to be served concurrently with all other Counts. Special assessment: $100. Total restitution: $43,978.54.

charges.charge_description: 8 U.S.C. § 1326(a)  Illegal Re-Entry After Deportation(43)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 24 months, to be served concurrently with Count 1 of the Indictment and Count 1 of the Information. Supervised release: 1 year, to be served concurrently with all other Counts. Special assessment: $100. Total restitution: $43,978.54.
